page.title: Integrations
page.subtitle: Connect MultiQuiz with your CRM and automation tools

webhook.title: CRM Webhook
webhook.description: Automatically send lead data to your CRM when a quiz is completed
webhook.urlHint: HTTPS endpoint that will receive quiz data (POST)
webhook.secretHint: Use this secret to verify request authenticity (HMAC-SHA256)

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Receive new lead notifications directly on WhatsApp
